game.name: Intelligence: Dinosaurs
game.shortDescription: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dinosaurs) in such a way - that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dinosaurs) in such a way - that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images

reviewHighlights.text: [b][quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote][/b] Intelligence: Dinosaurs is an asset flip, or what Valve...
